title: peaked at gold 5 ended season at silver 5 (decay :/)
body: placed in bronze 3 with a 5/5 promo record I am making a new account and getting rid of this one, the 1000s of dollars i've spent on this account are not worth being in bronze again.

replies.body: Decay doesn't change your MMR, only rank, so a reset would have brought you closer to your real rank. Meaning you must have lost so much in G5 that your MMR was almost Silver 5 which would have demoted you out of Gold anyway. Anyway, if you were actually anywhere near Gold in skill you should have no issue getting to Gold again.
I know i can get back there it's not the point I'm just saying the 200 games it's going to take is going to make me want to die.

If you are Gold level it won't take you 200, 100, or even 50 games. At a reset you get huge gains for your first bunch of wins, I don't know how many exactly, and you can skip divisions, you can even skip league promotion sets. Last year my placements were during the Feb-May server crap-out where every game for those months was basically screwed and I got shrekt to Silver because of every single game being a 2v5/3v5/4v5/crash. It took me what? Under 15 games to get to Gold again?
yeah I noticed that I won my last 3 games and I'm already in promos
So...you're going to level up another account and play against worse-than-Bronze, new players?
